metadata.title: CVE-2019-19648 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the macho_parse_file functionality in macho/macho.c of YARA 3.11.0,command_size may be inconsistent with the real size. A specially craftedMachO file can cause an out-of-bounds memory access, resulting in Denial ofService (application crash) or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: yara package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
